app/reviews/review.coffee.name: max_line_length
app/reviews/review.coffee.description: This rule imposes a maximum line length on your code. Python's style guide does a good job explaining why you might want to limit the length of your lines, though this is a matter of taste. Lines can be no longer than eighty characters by default.
